EmailTemplate.name: Site Visit Scheduled Cancelled
EmailTemplate.subject: Site Visit Scheduled Cancelled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Rescheduling Site Visit
Dear [Customer's Name],
We understand your busy schedule and that the site visit to Epitome Integrated City needs to be postponed from the scheduled date.
We kindly request your assistance in rescheduling the visit and confirming your availability at your earliest convenience.
We appreciate your response and confirmation.
Warm regards, Epitome Projects LLP
